input.sentences: went to moms today | it was a long flight | but she had amazing food when we arrived .
she had made flower arrangements from fruit | such a clever idea .
the little one taking it all in | she seemed to love it .
we all was able to catch up on old times .
as we were leaving | she said `` we 'll keep the lights on for you . ''
output.sentences: Mom was having her food brought to her on a flight.
She had an idea to make a fruit flower.
Making this would mean taking a lot of love from her family.
Times like this helped her catch up with loved ones.
The lights were on and every one was leaving.
